channel.title: Hellscape V3.0 need suggestions for updates
channel.description:
Suggest updates for hellscape so it can be a good server like trail to hell or blakscape, united pk and stranded isle. Already got this:
Quote from: Mod Taharok on June 16, 2007, 09:31:21 PM Everyone, stop flaming each other. If you don't like the server, don't post
Server Forums: Register here http://www.freewebs.com/hellscapex
Server IP: hellscape.myftp.biz
Server Port: 43594(default)
Server online? :online with owner :online :offline :something hapened!and its offline.We have to wait for owner to come and fix this.
Server:
If you need to train kill monsters don't train on dummies because it doesn't give a lot of exp.
Minigame: Kill the admin that changes form.(admins made up that minigame)
Ham:no.If you do not have hamachi you can download it http://hamachi.cc/
Owner:Angelofdeath
Server Staff: Admins: Assasin Caleb Admin
Mods: *Open* *Open* *Open* *Open*
Want to make money?? Steal from tea stall. Kill players.
Admins are good.And kind.
Rules: No bad words. No using monsters to attack players. No scamming players. No attacking players in minigame slay the admin that changes form!only attack admins. No massing. No cursing. Dont advertise your server while playing Hellscape. Ask before you fight! *HAVE FUN!*
If you see anyone breaking these rules tell any admin or mod.
Server Features: Thieving, Slayer, Attack, Defence, Strenght, Herblore, Farming, Crafting, Fishing, Runecrafting, Agility.
Commands: ::yell(talk to everyone) ::gnomecourse(tele to gnome agility course to train agaility. ::essmine(tele to ess mine) ::runecraft(tele to bank to go to diferent rune altars) ::barbariancourse(tele to barb agility course) ::werewolfcourse(tele to were wolf agility course) ::farming(tele to farming area) ::herblore(tele to herblore store) ::herbloremenu(all herblore info) ::crafting(tele to crafting store) ::theifmenu(thieving guide) ::craftingmenu(crafting guide) ::fishingmenu(fishing guide) ::fish(tele to fish area/store) ::wild(teles you to wild) ::players(shows you how much players are playing) ::range(teleports you to play range) Adding more soon!

Server Logos!
Are you proud of playing Hellscape?Then put this on your sign:
Proud player of Hellscape!Join now! IP:hellscape.myftp.biz Port:43594(default) http://moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,159163.msg1494957.html#msg1494957
This is for moderators:
Proud mod of Hellscape!Join now! IP:hellscape.myftp.biz Port:43594(default) http://moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,159163.msg1494957.html#msg1494957
This is for administrators: Proud admin of Hellscape!Join now! IP:hellscape.myftp.biz Port:43594(default) http://moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,159163.msg1494957.html#msg1494957
Don't forget to post.
If you have any pics please pm the link to me i'll be happy to post them.
Thanks for joining and playing hellscape! Hope you enjoy it!

item.title: Hellscape V3.0 need suggestions for updates
item.dc:creator: @q_warrior6 q warrior6
item.description:
@q_warrior6 wrote:

Suggest updates for hellscape so it can be a good server like trail to hell or blakscape, united pk and stranded isle.
Already got this:

Quote from: Mod Taharok on June 16, 2007, 09:31:21 PM
Everyone, stop flaming each other. If you don’t like the server, don’t post

Server Forums:
Register here
http://www.freewebs.com/hellscapex

Server IP:
hellscape.myftp.biz

Server Port:
43594(default)

Server online?
:online with owner
:online
:offline
:something hapened!and its offline.We have to wait for owner to come and fix this.

Server:

If you need to train kill monsters don’t train on dummies because it doesn’t give a lot of exp.

Minigame:
Kill the admin that changes form.(admins made up that minigame)

Ham:no.If you do not have hamachi you can download it http://hamachi.cc/

Owner:Angelofdeath

Server Staff:
Admins:
Assasin
Caleb
Admin

Mods:
Open
Open
Open
Open

Want to make money??
Steal from tea stall.
Kill players.

Admins are good.And kind.

Rules:
No bad words.
No using monsters to attack players.
No scamming players.
No attacking players in minigame slay the admin that changes form!only attack admins.
No massing.
No cursing.
Dont advertise your server while playing Hellscape.
Ask before you fight!
HAVE FUN!

If you see anyone breaking these rules tell any admin or mod.

Server Features:
Thieving, Slayer, Attack, Defence, Strenght,
Herblore, Farming, Crafting, Fishing, Runecrafting,
Agility.

Commands:
::yell(talk to everyone)
::gnomecourse(tele to gnome agility course to train agaility.
::essmine(tele to ess mine)
::runecraft(tele to bank to go to diferent rune altars)
::barbariancourse(tele to barb agility course)
::werewolfcourse(tele to were wolf agility course)
::farming(tele to farming area)
::herblore(tele to herblore store)
::herbloremenu(all herblore info)
::crafting(tele to crafting store)
::theifmenu(thieving guide)
::craftingmenu(crafting guide)
::fishingmenu(fishing guide)
::fish(tele to fish area/store)
::wild(teles you to wild)
::players(shows you how much players are playing)
::range(teleports you to play range)
Adding more soon!
